name: 陳靜儀
objective:
進階設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。本學期主要學習目標，幫助每一位同學有效完成研究計畫的審核。
Advanced Design project in studies, history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。 Hence, students are required to finish and pass the accessment concerning detailed research scheme.
schedule:
W01. 說明課程目標、架構、內容與評分方式 (Introduction)
W02. 研究類型與工具運用 (Type of research & tools to assist with research)
W03. 核心論文與討論 (Key paper and group discussion)
W04. 核心論文與擴展；口頭報告 (Oral Presentation)
W05. 核心論文與擴展；口頭報告 (Oral Presentation)
W06. 小組討論 (Group discussion)
W07. 研究方法與分析方法；分組討論 (Research Methods and Analysis; group discussion)
W08. 研究計畫書的架構與寫作：段落、可讀性與注意事項 (Structure and Writing of Research Proposals: Paragraphs, readability, ...)
W09. 期中報告 (Midterm Report)
W10. 精準表達、學術研究的數據溝通與資料視覺化方法 (Precise expression, academic research data communication, and data visualization methods)
W11. 提報演練與批判性思考 (Critical thinking & Presentation Practice)
W12. 提報演練與批判性思考 (Critical thinking & Presentation Practice) 
W13. 設計專題範疇、關鍵定義與差異 (Design topic areas, key definitions and differences)
W14. 設計研究專題 & 分組討論 (Design research topics; group discussion)
W15. 設計研究專題 & 分組討論 (Design research topics; group discussion)
W16. 設計研究專題 & 分組討論 (Design research topics; group discussion)
W17. 期末報告 I  (Final report I)
W18. 期末報告 II  (Final report II)
